event.title: called Private Selection Shelled Pistachios in a 10-ounce container with UPC code 111073615 and the sell dates of December 13 or 14

data.event: Kroger Co. is recalling shelled pistachios called Private Selection Shelled Pistachios in a 10-ounce container with UPC code 111073615 and the sell dates of December 13 or 14 on the packages.

event.title: was discovered by Kraft foods during routine testing last Tuesday

data.event: The salmonella contamination was discovered by Kraft foods during routine testing last Tuesday, before any illness were reported.

event.title: a salmonella outbreak at the end of January

data.event: This recall follows the long list of recalled peanut related products, peanut butter and candy bars which caused a salmonella outbreak at the end of January.
